Node.definition: = action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a large open place on the side of a rock or mountain, ► used for burying and hiding, or as a temporary dwelling place
= town; ◄ located in the foothills (שְׁפֵלָה) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► David (דָּוִד) and his men used to hide in a nearby cave
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry; ◄ smallest unit within family group

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to climb down|to step down|to descend
Node.definition: = action by which human, animals, or deities move (voluntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

Node.gloss: to come together|to gather|to assemble|to rally|to (re)unite
Node.definition: = action by which humans or animals come together as a group for a common purpose
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action with which a person gives money or something of value to another person with the expectation that it will be paid back or returned
literally: bitter; hence: = state in which humans are in deep distress

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= state in which a countable entity is four in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)
= state in which humans remain in a place that is not their home for a relatively short time
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= area shaped and located in such a way that it is hard to access and can be easily defended against enemies; ◄ this can be a natural stronghold in the mountains (e.g. caves) or a construction erected by humans in populated areas; ≈ often associated with security and sometimes used as an epithet for leaders or deities that are considered providers of security

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ► seer and prophet (נָבִיא) time of king David (דָּוִד)
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity

= state in which humans remain in a place that is not their home for a relatively short time

= area shaped and located in such a way that it is hard to access and can be easily defended against enemies; ◄ this can be a natural stronghold in the mountains (e.g. caves) or a construction erected by humans in populated areas; ≈ often associated with security and sometimes used as an epithet for leaders or deities that are considered providers of security
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a large group of trees or shrubs which grow close together and where several wild animals are known to live; ≈ considered to be a dangerous place for humans and domestic animals
= forest; ◄ territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

= town, possibly to be identified with Geba (גֶּבַע) ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► place where someone's concubine (פִּילֶגֶשׁ) was raped by a large group of men; home town of King Saul (שָׁאוּל)

= small, fast growing tree, about 10 m. high, to be found abundantly in deserts, dunes, and salt marshes; leafless, has green branches, and a wide crown; this tree has small white flowers, and its fruit is a capsule with feathery seeds; ◄ |itamarix aphylla|i*; ► has durable wood; ≈ could have a link with cultic worship
= an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a mountain (הַר)
= a long, straight rod, usually made of wood, with a sharp iron (בַּרְזֶל) head or point; used for piercing by thrusting; its length varied from the height of a man to much longer

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= state in which humans, deities or animals place themselves in a certain location in an upright position

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Obed (עֹובֵד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► father of David (דָּוִד)

= a piece of land outside of inhabited areas, which is the property of individuals, generally used for cultivating food trees, grain, and vegetables; can be bought and sold; property which can be transferred from one person to another
= field where grapes (עֲנָב) are cultivated, growing on vines (גֶּפֶן) typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a watchtower (מִגְדָּל) and a wine press (יֶקֶב)

Node.gloss: to place (in a position) > to appoint
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities give (other) humans a certain task or responsibility
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times

= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= action by which humans devise a plan concerning other humans ► with the intention to harm that person

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= state in which humans, deities or animals place themselves in a certain location in an upright position
= action by which humans, supernatural beings, forces of nature, or other objects face a direction different from the one they were facing before

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
literally: (one's) hand is with (someone else); hence: = action by with humans or deities offer assistance to (other) humans
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= action by which humans move to another place in haste, ► in order to escape from a dangerous situation
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
literally: to uncover (someone's) ear; hence: = causative action by which a deity or human being discloses previously unknown information to someone else

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry
= state in which someone is willing to do something

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

Node.gloss: to stretch out (one's) hand|to stretch out (one's) right hand|to lay (one's) hand
Node.definition: = action by which humans stretch out their hand, right hand, or finger in order to do point with it or to put it in position for another action

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

Node.gloss: to stretch out (one's) hand > to lift a hand (to do something)
Node.definition: literally: to stretch out (one's) hand (to do something); hence: = action by which humans take a conscious decision to perform a certain event
= action by which humans go and meet other humans ► with the purpose of killing or harming that person
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= action by which humans, supernatural beings, forces of nature, or other objects face a direction different from the one they were facing before
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= action by which humans go and meet other humans ► with the purpose of killing or harming that person
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

= man; ◄ Edomite (אֲדֹמִי) ► official, during the time of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) who betrayed the whereabouts of David (דָּוִד) to his master and later killed the priests of YHWH|= action by which humans, supernatural beings, forces of nature, or other objects face a direction different from the one they were facing before
= person originating from Edom (אֱדֹום)
= action by which humans go and meet other humans ► with the purpose of killing or harming that person
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine|= state in which a countable entity is eighty in number
= state in which a countable entity is five in number
literally: to hold, carry; hence: = state in which humans are dressed in a piece of clothing; ► used exclusively for the ephod worn by priests; ≈ associated with some level of responsibility as well
= garment; reaching from the shoulders to the waist; ◄ made from linen; ► normally worn by priests (כֹּהֵן) but also by David (דָּוִד) when the ark was brought to Jerusalem

= woven material ◄ made from the stems of the flax plant; absorbs perspiration better than many other types of cloth; ► used for production of clothes; worn by priests and supernatural beings; ≈ associated with quality, strength, and coolness

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= town; ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► for priests (כֹּהֵן)

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= the sharp side or end of a sword (חֶרֶב)
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment
particle linking two objects, of which the first is not always listed explicitly; = relation indicating that object X and object Y are at opposite ends of a range of similar objects
= woman as a social class, to be distinguished from the men and the children
= a person of a young age, usually before puberty
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= a child that is still drinking milk from its mother's breasts

= domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see עַיִר (עַיִר) female see אָתֹון (אָתֹון)
= male or female herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns
= the sharp side or end of a sword (חֶרֶב)
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= man; ◄ son of Ahitub (אֲחִיטוּב) ► father of Abiathar (אֶבְיָתָר) priest (כֹּהֵן) time of king David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Phinehas (פִּינְחָס) priest (כֹּהֵן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי)
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= man; ◄ son of Ahimelech (אֲחִימֶלֶךְ) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of king David (דָּוִד)
= action by which humans move to another place in haste, ► in order to escape from a dangerous situation
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= man; ◄ son of Ahimelech (אֲחִימֶלֶךְ) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of king David (דָּוִד)
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= man; ◄ son of Ahimelech (אֲחִימֶלֶךְ) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of king David (דָּוִד)
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= man; ◄ Edomite (אֲדֹמִי) ► official, during the time of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) who betrayed the whereabouts of David (דָּוִד) to his master and later killed the priests of YHWH
= person originating from Edom (אֱדֹום)
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= a human being, as defined by the life principle that animates him/her
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry; ◄ smallest unit within family group
= state in which humans remain in a place that is not their home for a relatively short time
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
